poemContent: Sickly pale,as he beats it as fast as hislarge American body can.Beating the enter key,with useless waifu spam.Rem desktop background,burned into his graphics card.Rem body pillow, in his brute-sized bed,hard."I am not a weeb cause I like other stuff",he retorted,"He said that Islam was a country in Africa",zekiahepic reported.And as a cycles blender render, displayingschwartz stories in black and white,and the hanging Rem 3D model,at 10PM, night.Zekiah, Major, Bushilooked upon their screens,And observed the circus of midday anime rants,from the clown weeb.
